Experience Materials Engineer Intel Corporation July 2012  – Present (3 years 2 months) Shenzhen, Guangdong, China Mechanical Engineer Oticon China August 2008  –  July 2012  (4 years) - Responsible for sourcing development and project management of projects running in China.  
- Source best supplier for different categories considering cost, capability and quality.  
- Audit new supplier on site and provide report with cost comparison. Discuss with overseas team to make decision.  
- RFQ, price and payment term negotiation  
- Manage project by following up on schedule and coordinating global team/internal source and suppliers.  
- Review Tooling design and FOT sample before submitting to Denmark team.  
- Working with supplier on pre-production stage, verify the working instruction and inspection instruction of supplier.  
- Weekly video meeting with global sites  
- Optimize the system and procedure of the office regarding supplier audit, supplier performance management and working procedure with global sites. Sourcing Buyer Laird Technologies December 2007  –  June 2008  (7 months) Shenzhen - Working for Thermal unit (Melcor, Thermagon and Supercool) for material localization. 
- Support to project team to move manufacturing of product from USA to Shenzhen plant. 
- Main commodity is heat sink, fan, cable/wire and sheet metal part. Sourcing Engineer Emerson August 2005  –  December 2007  (2 years 5 months) Identify opportunities for material localization, considering product's technical requirements and find the right supplier with best total cost 
- Initiate cost reduction project with engineering team and supplier to do contribution on material cost saving, e.g. revise the specification with material replacement or figure change  
- Provide sourcing support to new product development, propose material or provide specification information to project team and evaluate part cost 
- Conduct reverse auction bidding on web based system, get cost saving and terms benefit. Negotiate agreement terms with suppliers.  
- Work with global commodity team to implement commodity strategy on global managed commodities 
- Draft and implement strategy on site managed commodities 
 
- Perform supplier audit and make sourcing decision considering cost, capability, quality assurance and so on 
- Do project management on sourcing projects, work with internal departments and suppliers to make sure project implemented within schedule 
- Manage supplier rating, monitor supplier cost, quality and OTD performance 
- Create and maintain the capacity data base of major commodities. 
- Take RoHS management on the responsible commodities Product Engineer Foxconn July 2004  –  August 2005  (1 year 2 months) Responsible for the new product introduction of mobile phone product 
- Design review on customer drawing, communicate with customer and internal tooling designer on part or tooling design issues  
- Follow the plastic/stamping tooling fabrication, tooling trial and 1st article sample review  
- Follow the pilot run of secondary process, e.g. painting and plating, work with assembly workshop to set up assembly line and solve issues before mass production. 
- Do test on mechanical part and final cell phone, e.g. drop test 
- Submit sample and FAI report to customer, analyze the feedback of customer and call project meeting to make improvement when necessary 
- resolve the quality issue at the beginning of mass production 
- Do coordination with cross function departments; assist project manager with other task assigned
